xmldoc.short_description: Get top rows of table or array.

param_output_item.param_description: a integer value: Number of rows to extract (k = 8 by default).

description.p: head(A) displays the first eight rows of an array, or table A in the Command Window without assigning it to a variable.
head(A, k) displays the first k rows of A.
B = head(...) returns the specified rows of A for any of the previous syntaxes, withB having the same data type as A.
